title: MODERN_1BR___Washer/Dryer IN UNIT ____$1950___ ___BAY RIDGE SHORE ROAD
posting_body: ['Showing By Appointment ONLY****', 'Welcome to Bay Ridge Junior 1 Bedroom Walk-in apartment.', 'This Cozy Junior 1 bedroom apartment is located in a prime location of Bay Ridge close to neighborhood shopping, dining and public transportation.', 'The apartment features modern styling, granite flooring throughout, marble bathroom, central air conditioning, and washer/dryer.', "This apartment's bedroom is spacious and can fit a Queen size bedroom set.", 'The bathroom is retiled and has charming finishes.', 'The living room is flexible and can fit many setups using a full living room set.', "This apartment's kitchen has plenty of cabinet space.", 'The large windows in the apartment provide plenty of natural light.', 'Located centrally in Prime Bay Ridge, Brooklyn on 90th Street & 3rd Avenue, close to great restaurants, shopping and transportation.', 'Pets are upon approval.', 'The Location is perfect with the convenience of many Transportation options with the Express Buses right at your door for an incredibly fast 15 minute ride to downtown Manhattan or the City bus can take you to the subway.', 'The Neighborhood amenities are amazing.', 'They include Shore Road botanical gardens and bike path so you can enjoy a bike ride.', 'Call or Text Daniel at 347-429-2213 to view.']
